msg: Calculate the [start|end]-indent in the first 2 cases in 5.3.2. The last

msg: Force a 0mpt border-width when the border-style is 'none'.

msg: Avoid a rounding error when the ratios already match.

author: bckfnn
msg: Gets rid of currentBlockIPPosition. Use currentIPPosition instead and
restore it after each block-level area.

author: bckfnn
msg: Save the current number of spans. This fix a bug where multiple spans
were created, one for each toplevel block.
